Bicycle with a built-in water filter: This bicycle would come equipped with a water filter system, allowing riders to refill their water bottles with clean, filtered water while on the go.
Bicycle with a built-in music system: This bicycle would have a built-in music system, allowing riders to listen to their favorite tunes while pedaling.
Bicycle with a built-in air pump: This bicycle would have an air pump built into the frame, allowing riders to inflate their tires as needed.
Bicycle with a built-in bike lock: This bicycle would have a built-in bike lock, allowing riders to secure their bikes to a fixed object when parked.
Bicycle with a built-in bike light: This bicycle would have a built-in bike light, allowing riders to see and be seen in low-light conditions.
